item.title: Trump calls for Judge Merchan disbarment
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump on Saturday demanded that the New York judge overseeing his business-record case be disbarred.

item.title: Reminders of Jan. 6 attack fade in the Capitol as Trump retakes power
item.description: Inside the Capitol, reminders of the violence are increasingly hard to find.
